body.text:
1 śrāvastyāṃ nidānam /
2 ye kecid bhikṣavaḥ samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajaṃti sarve te caturṇām ā

children.text:
satyānāṃ jñānāya /
3 katameṣāṃ caturṇām /
4 duḥkham āryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya duḥkhanirodhasya duḥkha

odhagāminī pratipad āryasatyasya jñānāya /
5 tasmāt tarhi caturṇām āryasatyānām anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya atimātraṃ tīvra
ndo vyāyāmaś cotsuḍhiś cāprativāṇiś ca smṛtyā saṃprajanyena ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
MS "abhisamayāya adhimātra tivraś ca vyāyāmaś" for "abhisamayāya adhimātraṃ tīvraś chandaś ca vyāyāmaś"?

tyasūtraṃ samāptaḥ /
9 rakṣaṃ bhavatu // + + + syasya svāhā //
